title: Today's NYT Connections: Sports Edition Hints and Answers for May 10, #229
description: Here's today's Connections: Sports Edition answer and hints for groups. These clues will help you solve The New York Times' popular puzzle game, Connections: Sports Edition, every day.

title: J.C. Snead, Golfing Nephew of His Uncle Sam, Dies at 84
description: He knew he could never match the success of the great Sam Snead, but he won eight tournaments on the PGA Tour and four more on the senior circuit.

title: In Belgium, the Long History of a Famed Track
description: The Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps was created in 1921 and curves through the beauty of the Ardennes in Belgium.

title: Antisemitic Sign at Barstool Sports Bar Draws Outrage
description: The incident at a Philadelphia bar owned by the Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy comes amid a surge of antisemitic episodes in the United States.

title: VacationStars-of-Womens-Sports
Upstate N.Y. school system’s support for trans athletes draws federal investigation.
description: The Saratoga Springs school board had pledged to safeguard students’ right to participate in activities consistent with their gender identity.

title: A Fencing Match, a Viral Video and a Hearing Before Congress
description: A fencer’s refusal to compete against a transgender opponent in a women’s bout at a Maryland meet has put the issue in front of Congress.

title: At Least 1 Dead and 32 Injured After Bus Crashes Into S.U.V. in California
description: The bus crashed into a disabled S.U.V. on a highway in Los Angeles County around 5 a.m. Sunday, officials said.

title: The Best Player in the W.N.B.A. Now Has Her Own Shoe. It Took a Long Time.
description: The marketability of A’ja Wilson offers a case study in race, fame and gender.

title: A Pope Who Ministers to the Suffering? Yup, He’s a White Sox Fan.
description: Pope Leo was spotted at the 2005 World Series, a rare moment of triumph for the pride of Chicago’s South Side.

title: Chelsea F.C. Ends Inquiry Into Bullying Allegations Without Sharing Findings
description: The Premier League soccer team had committed to overhauling its culture, but employees are still looking for an acknowledgment of remorse.

title: Broadcast mogul Sanjog Gupta in line to increase Indian influence at ICC
description: Sanjog Gupta has emerged as the frontrunner to become the new chief executive of the International Cricket Council

title: Warwickshire draw with Surrey, Essex v Yorkshire, and more: county cricket day four – live
description: Join Tanya Aldred for all the latest from the final day of the latest round of County Championship matches

title: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes out of hospital after crash that killed two children
description: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes has been released from hospital after a collision that killed two children on Saturday afternoon

title: Emma Raducanu’s Italian Open run screeches to halt against Coco Gauff
description: Fourth seed Coco Gauff overwhelmed Britain’s Emma Raducanu in a dominant 6-1, 6-2 win that sent her through to the quarter-finals

title: Leicester turn to Geoff Parling as head coach after hunt for Cheika’s successor
description: Geoff Parling has been appointed as Leicester’s new head coach, bringing an end to a drawn out recruitment process to find Michael Cheika’s successor

title: India’s Virat Kohli retires from Test cricket: ‘I’ve given everything I had’
description: Virat Kohli has announced his retirement from Test cricket, bringing down the curtain on a sparkling career in the longest format

title: Paralyzed to Powerful: how college rugby star Robert Paylor fought back from a broken neck
description: Catastrophically injured, the Cal lock was told he would not walk again. Refusing to accept defeat, he is now an author and speaker, still in love with his sport

title: Can watching sport really improve your wellbeing? The science suggests it can | Sean Ingle
description: Couch potatoes and die-hard fans rejoice; all that time and money spent on your sports addiction may just be worth it

title: Notts beat Hampshire, Essex v Yorkshire and more: county cricket – as it happened
description: There were thumping wins for Notts, Northants and Glamorgan on day three of the latest Championship round

title: Raducanu sets up Gauff meeting with fightback win, while Draper progresses
description: Emma Raducanu defeated Veronika Kudermetova 5-7, 6-0, 6-1 and will face the fourth seed Coco Gauff, while Jack Draper saw off Vit Kopriva 6-4, 6-3

title: Sneyd inspires Warrington to defeat Leigh and reach Challenge Cup final
description: Marc Sneyd, 17 days after fracturing an eye socket, kicked nine points as Warrington beat Leigh 21-14 in St Helens to reach the Challenge Cup final

title: Skinner helps Exeter defeat second-string Saints but Baxter issues warning
description: Exeter Chiefs defeated a youthful Northampton 42-14 as Harvey Skinner grabbed two tries, but Rob Baxter admitted the hosts had ‘a lot to work on’

title: Jesse Hogan feeds off hostile crowd as GWS Giants breach Geelong fortress again | Jonathan Horn
description: The reigning Coleman medallist drags the Giants over the line to claim their fifth victory in as many matches at the Cats’ home ground

title: Alvarado banned and fined $62,000 for overuse of whip in Kentucky Derby win
description: Junior Alvarado, who rode Sovereignty to victory at last weekend’s Kentucky Derby, has been fined and banned for overuse of his whip

title: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes injured in crash that killed two children
description: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes has been injured in a collision that also killed two children on Saturday in his hometown of Largo, Florida

title: Quicker and more social: indoor golf simulators offer way into game for women and young players | Jack Snape
description: Increasingly sophisticated technology is helping change the perception of the sport and produce a new wave of different golfer

title: Jannik Sinner returns with a win to leave rocking Rome celebrating again
description: World No 1 Jannik Sinner played his first match after three-month doping ban and comfortably defeats Mariano Navone 6-3, 6-4

title: County cricket day two: Warwickshire’s batters go big against Surrey – as it happened
description: Ed Barnard and Zen Malik celebrated centuries as Warwickshire put up a first-innings total of 665 against Surrey

title: Cadan Murley hat-trick lifts Harlequins and shatters Gloucester’s playoff dream
description: Gloucester slipped out of the playoff places following a 38-19 defeat to a resurgent Harlequins at Twickenham

title: Bristol enjoy Cardiff takeover and boost playoff hopes with win over Bath
description: Bristol beat Bath 36-14 in front of more than 50,000 at Cardiff’s Principality Stadium to boost their playoff hopes

title: Hull KR tame Dragons and book Wembley date in push to end 40-year drought
description: Hull KR beat Catalans Dragons 36-12 to reach the Challenge Cup final, increasing hope of their first silverware for 40 years

title: Horse racing: Hollie Doyle takes Turner’s British women’s record for winners
description: Victory at Ascot on Brindavan was Doyle’s 1,023rd, while Aidan O’Brien’s Ballydoyle operation prospered at Lingfield

title: India great Virat Kohli set to call time on Test cricket career before England tour
description: Virat Kohli is set to deliver another blow to India’s plans for their imminent tour of England by indicating he wants to retire from Test cricket

title: Brave Australia dealt reality check in defeat to ruthless New Zealand
description: Wallaroos lose 38-12 to Black Ferns in Pacific Four Series opener as reigning World Cup champions extend hoodoo over rivals to 28 matches

title: Believe the hype: make Pollock the Lions midweek captain and watch him flourish | Ugo Monye
description: Northampton flanker brings energy and excitement and can thrive if given the honour and responsibility by Andy Farrell

title: Cricket paying the price for being ruled by the big stick, and the big cheque | Barney Ronay
description: The suspension of the IPL has ramifications for the game worldwide, but it has allowed itself to be too in thrall to the Indian money machine

title: Draper shows top-five class to see off Darderi after Raducanu deals with late surprise
description: Jack Draper won 6-1, 6-4 to reach the Italian Open third round after Emma Raducanu had beaten the late replacement Jil Teichmann 6-2, 6-2

title: England Lion McCann fires up Notts but champions Surrey struggle
description: Join Tanya Aldred for updates from around the grounds on day one of the latest round of County Championship matches

title: Pollock a proud Lion after ‘nailing it’ for Northampton and England
description: A call-up from Andy Farrell for the young flanker crowns a remarkable breakthrough year with club and country

title: England open to hosting IPL after border hostilities prompt suspension
description: The ECB is open to hosting the remainder of the IPL in September after escalating tension between India and Pakistan prompted the suspension of the lucrative T20 tournament

title: UNC says Bill Belichick’s girlfriend still welcome at school despite reports
description: UNC on Friday denied reports that Jordon Hudson, the girlfriend of head football coach Bill Belichick, has been banned from its football facilities

title: Brains before brawn in modern rugby | Letters
description: Letter: Sport authorities must address the heightened risk of repetitive brain trauma in the fierce modern game, writes Dr Donald Williams

title: Competitive Itoje willing to learn from Mount Rushmore of Lions captains
description: Maro Itoje has listened to Martin Johnson and Sam Warburton as he prepares his ‘tough men’ for the tour of Australia

title: Your Guardian Sport weekend: WSL finale, Lions stars on show and El Clásico
description: Here’s how to follow along with our coverage – the finest writing and up-to-the-minute reports

title: The IPL is a good barometer in India: its suspension shows us how serious this is
description: The IPL is so closely intertwined with India’s politics that even cricket’s richest tournament could not continue at a time of serious crisis

title: Horse racing: East India Dock flies home for Chester Cup glory, plus a Saturday preview
description: The 2025 Chester Cup success of East India Dock proved to be a big day in the careers of two of racing’s rising stars

title: Australia welcomes Owen Farrell omission but Lions get backing as firm favourites
description: The prospect of an underwhelming squad did not materialise but most commentators suggest the Wallabies can be competitive

title: IPL cricket suspended amid growing India-Pakistan tensions
description: India’s cricket board has suspended the Indian Premier League amid rising tensions between India and Pakistan, whose PSL will move to the UAE

title: Gregg Popovich: the NBA truth teller who held Trump, and the US, to account
description: The coach is stepping away from a role in which he won five championships with the Spurs. He will be hard to replace, on and off the court

title: ‘I’m always fighting myself’: Mohammad Abbas on Notts, Pakistan and Guardiola’s hotel room
description: The seamer tells Ali Martin about facing his former club Hampshire this week, family tragedy and his stop-start international career

title: Farrell’s Lions squad has the flexibility and talent to be highly competitive | Robert Kitson
description: Australia is no country for old men so the exclusion of Owen Farrell and selection of Henry Pollock will help the cause

title: Manx Liberty’s wildcards deliver in style to regain British team chess crown
description: The Isle of Man team enlisted two young English stars to help regain the 4NCL title that they won in 2022 and 2023

title: Sports quiz of the week: Leeds, Lions, Zhao Xintong, camogie and F1 winners
description: Have you been following the big stories in football, rugby, snooker, Formula One, cricket, golf, horse racing and GAA?

title: Lions squad 2025: Farrell unveils 38-man squad with ‘wiggle room’ to add son Owen
description: Andy Farrell has announced Maro Itoje will captain a 38-strong Lions squad which features the tyro Henry Pollock and a record 12 players from Leinster

title: Farrell plays the O2 Arena but Lions squad reveal slips up by ripping off fans
description: Staging a live event is not such a bad idea but it should not have been used as an opportunity to gouge more money out of loyal followers

title: LA to make Olympic history with two-venue opening ceremony in 2028
description: LA will make Olympic history in 2028 by staging the opening ceremony of the Summer Games across two venues: the LA Memorial Coliseum and SoFi Stadium

title: Pogacar’s absence from Giro d’Italia may offer breath of fresh air for competition
description: Dominance of last year’s champion can become predictable and this event could be volatile with more opportunities for the peloton

title: Horse racing: more records for Aidan O’Brien as Chester dominance continues
description: Mount Kilimanjaro and Illinois produced victories in the day’s big races as the trainer struck again at the Roodee

title: British & Irish Lions squad 2025: the chosen 38 players
description: We profile each player from England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland who will compete for places in Andy Farrell’s Test match squads to take on Australia this summer

title: AFL invite backlash as they make it up as they go with Willie Rioli case | Jonathan Horn
description: Inconsistency at head office has resulted in a tedious, toxic, utterly avoidable mess. The whole thing could have been handled so much better
